content: bob the dino no-sew crochet t-rex pattern by fatdogcrochet 1 materials and stitches used materials black yarn can be a smaller sized yarn this is for eyes but i used 6mm safety eyes 2 colors of yarn i used red heart acrylic crochet hook i used 4mm stuffing stitch marker optional scissors yarn needle optional stitches used magic_ring magic_ring yo yarn over single_crochet single_crochet increase increase cc color change decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch bobble bobble stitch shell shell # the total stitch count f/o fasten_off 2 more info pattern notes when you single_crochet down chain you start in the 2nd chain from the hook to get bobbles to stand out you can put them in the front loops only the dino is made in continuous rounds that are not joined with a slip_stitch at the end you can change the leg placement if the legs do not line up special stitches how to shell in the same stitch put 5 double crochets see page 6 for more how to bobble stitch in the same stitch yo insert hook to pull up a loop yo pull through two loops repeat 4 times total yo and pull through all the loops see page 6 color changing to make it easier to read there are two colors in this pattern a body color and b the spikes color 3 bob crochet pattern body start with a 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 6 increase 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4 18 single_crochet 18 *tighten and tie off the magic_ring* 5 4 single_crochet chain 3 2 single_crochet down chain 6 single_crochet chain 3 2 single_crochet in chain 8 single_crochet 18 6 4 single_crochet go behind chain 6 single_crochet go behind chain 8 single_crochet 18 see page 5 7 18 single_crochet 18 *add safety eyes between rounds 3 and 4 3 stitches apart * 8 17 single_crochet chain 5 4 single_crochet down chain 1 single_crochet 26 - this includes the stitches added by the chain 9 26 single_crochet 26 don t go behind the chain crochet in it 10 4 single_crochet bobble 5 single_crochet bobble 15 single_crochet 26 11 single_crochet decrease x 8 2 single_crochet 18 *stuff the body* 12 9 decrease 9 *finish stuffing the body and stuff the tail* f/o and sew up go to page 6 to add spikes you can embroider a mouth between rounds 4 and 5 4 from eye to eye going around a chain crochet up to put hook insert hook the last single_crochet behind the into next single_crochet before the chain after the chain stitch continue pull up a loop finish stitch crocheting 5 details spikes attach color b i attach with a slip_stitch between rounds 1 and 2 in the front of the dino shell in same stitch as slip_stitch skip a stitch slip_stitch x 6 if your shells are squished then skip two stitches instead of one special stitches shell bobble stitch 6 photos for reference front angle side group 7 thank
